subject: PIL
title: Continuing Studies
info: students complete work for another pil course in which an incomplete was received. registration allows students to access academic advising in pil.

subject: PIL
title: Degree Planning
info: students develop individualized curricular plans for their baccalaureate degrees.

subject: PIL
title: Degree Plan
info: continuation or additional registration for degree planning.

subject: PIL
title: Project 1 Seminar
info: students develop project proposal, identify objectives/resources, conduct research, accomplish an outcome, secure a narrative evaluation from project adviser/evaluator.

subject: PIL

info: students develop proposal, identify objectives/resources, conduct research, accomplish an outcome, secure a narrative evaluation from project adviser/evaluator.

subject: PIL
title: Program Active
info: registration maintains program activity and access to pil advising and student service.

subject: PIL
title: Major Project
info: students complete a major project as partial fulfillment of criterion for primary area studies in their degree plans.

subject: PIL
title: Major Proj
info: additional registration for students who need to complete their major projects.

subject: PIL
title: Major Proj
info: additional registration for students completing their major projects.

subject: PIL
title: Grad Prep
info: students compile a graduation dossier for presentation to preliminary review committee. dossier consists of criteria summary, introduction, transcripts, illustrative materials, project proposals, degree plan.

subject: PIL
title: Grad Prep
info: students complete draft dossier.

subject: PIL
title: Graduation Preparation
info: students complete draft dossier.

subject: PIL
title: Graduation Review
info: students revise graduation dossier, present it to graduation review committee for ba or bs degree recommendation.
